      • deleteFireStation

        public int deleteFireStation​(java.lang.String address,
                             java.lang.Integer stationNumber)
        Deleting a fire station.
        Specified by:
        deleteFireStation in interface FireStationService
        Parameters:
        address - String : the fire station address to delete. Can be null if stationNumber is present..
        stationNumber - integer : the fire station number to delete. Can be null if address is present.
        Returns:
        an int corresponding to the state of the result. If 1 : a specific fire station was deleted; else if 2 all fire station with the same station number are deleted; else 3 all fire station mapped to the same address are deleted.
